sen.j: 息石耳命（いきそみみのみこと、またはおきそみみのみこと、生没年未詳）は、「日本書紀」に登場する古墳時代の皇族。
sen.e: Ikisomimi no mikoto (or Okisomimi no mikoto, the date of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Imperial family who appears in 'Nihonshoki' (Chronicles of Japan) who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).

Ikisomimi no mikoto (or Okisomimi no mikoto, the date of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Imperial family who appears in 'Nihonshoki' (Chronicles of Japan) who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).

Ikisomimi no mikoto (or Okisomimi no mikoto, the date of birth and death unknown) was a member of the Imperial family who appears in 'Nihonshoki' (Chronicles of Japan) who lived during the Kofun period (tumulus period).

sen.j: 安寧天皇の第一皇子で、母は渟名底仲媛命。
sen.e: He was the first Imperial prince of Emperor Annei, and his mother was Nunasokonakatsuhime no mikoto.
He was the first Imperial prince of Emperor Annei, and his mother was Nunasokonakatsuhime no mikoto.
He was the first Imperial prince of Emperor Annei, and his mother was Nunasokonakatsuhime no mikoto.

sen.j: 同母弟に懿徳天皇らがいる。
sen.e: His younger maternal half-brothers include Emperor Itoku.
His younger maternal half-brothers include Emperor Itoku.
His younger maternal half-brothers include Emperor Itoku.

sen.j: 子は天豊津媛命（懿徳天皇皇后）のみで、跡継ぎがなかったと「先代旧事本紀」に記されている。
sen.e: Amatoyotsuhime no mikoto (Empress of Emperor Itoku) was his only child, and it is described in 'Sendai Kujihongi' (Ancient Japanese History) that he had no heir.
Amatoyotsuhime no mikoto (Empress of Emperor Itoku) was his only child, and it is described in 'Sendai Kujihongi' (Ancient Japanese History) that he had no heir.
Amatoyotsuhime no mikoto (Empress of Emperor Itoku) was his only child, and it is described in 'Sendai Kujihongi' (Ancient Japanese History) that he had no heir.

sen.j: 「古事記」「日本書紀」の常津彦某命と同一人物という説がある。
sen.e: There is a theory that regards him and Tokotsuhikoiro no mikoto who appears in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) and "Nihonshoki" (Chronicles of Japan) as the same person.
sen.cmt: 常津彦某命の読み方不明です。
sen.e: There is a theory that regards him and Tokotsuhikoiro no mikoto who appears in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) and "Nihonshoki" as the same person.
sen.cmt: 日本書紀は2回目なので、定訳を削除しました。
sen.e: There is a theory that regards him and Tokotsuhikoiro no mikoto who appears in "Kojiki" (The Records of Ancient Matters) and "Nihonshoki" as the same person.
